title: Youth Empowerment Performing Arts

addons.text:
Cornerstone Youth Empowerment & Performing Arts  
 Cornerstone Youth Empowerment & Performing Arts is designed to provide a positive, essential learning environment where each child is challenged to progress through academic mastery and social skills development that will enable students to be successful in their future endeavor. This mission is designed to enhance basic skills, inspire learning, to provide experience and to encourage positive physical and emotional growth.  rgba(70, 72, 85, 0.7)

data.title: Cornerstone Youth Empowerment & Performing Arts
data.text: Cornerstone Youth Empowerment & Performing Arts is designed to provide a positive, essential learning environment where each child is challenged to progress through academic mastery and social skills development that will enable students to be successful in their future endeavor. This mission is designed to enhance basic skills, inspire learning, to provide experience and to encourage positive physical and emotional growth.

addons.text:
Cornerstone ChristIam Academy & Performing Arts  
 Cornerstone ChristIam Academy & Performing Arts, established May 18, 2020, is designed to supports individuals and organizations engaged in educational programs cultivating Christian values that make known the Gospel’s call for peace, justice, and healing throughout the world. The red letter I represents each role we play as individuals to be a part of the Unified body of believers. We are committed to providing a positive, essential learning environment where each child is challenged in mastering academic progress and social skills, talents, and gifts both natural and spiritual that will enable students to be successful in their future endeavor. This spectrum of services is geared more toward the creative arts, music, singing, dance, musical instruments, poetry, acting and drama These missions are designed to enhance basic skills, inspire learning, and provide experience in music dance and to encourage positive physical and emotional growth. We value the time-honored traditions of Christian service, education, and unconditional love to benefit all of God’s creation. rgba(70, 72, 85, 0.7)

Cornerstone ChristIam Academy & Performing Arts  
 Cornerstone ChristIam Academy & Performing Arts, established May 18, 2020, is designed to supports individuals and organizations engaged in educational programs cultivating Christian values that make known the Gospel’s call for peace, justice, and healing throughout the world. The red letter I represents each role we play as individuals to be a part of the Unified body of believers. We are committed to providing a positive, essential learning environment where each child is challenged in mastering academic progress and social skills, talents, and gifts both natural and spiritual that will enable students to be successful in their future endeavor. This spectrum of services is geared more toward the creative arts, music, singing, dance, musical instruments, poetry, acting and drama These missions are designed to enhance basic skills, inspire learning, and provide experience in music dance and to encourage positive physical and emotional growth.
